dcterms:creator: B.C. Lovell
G. Percannella
M. Vento
A. Wiliem
dcterms:description: The ICPR2014 dataset contains 13,596 training cell images extracted from 83 specimen images captured by a monochrome high dynamic range cooled microscopy camera. Each image belongs to one of six staining patterns: Homogeneous, Speckled, Nucleolar, Centromere, Nuclear Membrane, and Golgi.
dcterms:title: ICPR2014 dataset

dcterms:creator: P. Foggia
M. Vento
dcterms:description: The ICPR2012 dataset consists of 1,455 cell images extracted from 28 specimens acquired with a fluorescence microscope. The dataset is pre-partitioned into training and test sets, with each image belonging to one of six classes: Homogeneous, Coarse Speckled, Nucleolar, Centromere, Fine Speckled, and Cytoplasmic.
dcterms:title: ICPR2012 dataset
